newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee firms vs dollar and stg.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee firms vs dollar and stg.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee firmed against both the dollar and pound on Friday, reflecting international market trends, foreign exchange dealers said.
The rupee was fixed at a commercial mean rate of 20.4745 to the dollar, from 20.554 on Thursday, and at 33.185 to the pound, from 33.2545 on Thursday.
Forex dealers said that there was a slight shortage of hard currency in the local market and some commercial banks required dollars to meet demand from importers.
